title: GYM Website
description: A modern and responsive GYM website developed using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This project features a user-friendly interface, real-time data updates, and a fully functional backend. The website is fully deployed on GitHub, showcasing my ability to create dynamic web applications and implement full-stack solutions.

title: Swiggy UI Clone
description: A Swiggy UI clone developed using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This project replicates the user interface and functionality of the popular food delivery service, showcasing my skills in building responsive and interactive web applications. The clone is fully deployed on GitHub, demonstrating my ability to create complex front-end designs and implement backend services.

title: Blog Application
description: A Blog Application developed using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This project allows users to create, read, update, and delete blog posts, showcasing my skills in building full-stack web applications. The application is fully deployed on GitHub, demonstrating my ability to implement RESTful APIs and manage user authentication.

title: Weather App
description: A modern and responsive Weather App developed using the MERN stack (Express.js, React.js, Node.js). This project allows users to search for weather information by city, showcasing my skills in building full-stack web applications. The application is fully deployed on GitHub, demonstrating my ability to implement RESTful APIs and manage user authentication.

title: Digital Clock
description: A responsive Digital Clock web application developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project showcases real-time time updates with a clean and modern UI. The application is fully deployed on GitHub and demonstrates my ability to build interactive front-end features and handle dynamic data updates efficiently.

title: Registration Form
description: A modern and responsive Registration Form web application developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project features real-time validation, a clean user interface, and seamless user experience. The form is fully deployed on GitHub, demonstrating my ability to create interactive front-end solutions and implement best practices in web development.

title: Calculator
description: A fully functional and responsive Calculator web application developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project demonstrates my ability to implement core mathematical operations, design intuitive user interfaces, and ensure cross-device compatibility. The calculator is deployed on GitHub and showcases my proficiency in front-end development and problem-solving.

title: Ice Cream Website
description: A visually appealing and responsive Ice Cream website developed using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. This project highlights my ability to create engaging user interfaces with modern design principles and seamless responsiveness across devices. The website is fully deployed on GitHub, demonstrating my proficiency in front-end development and effective use of Bootstrap for rapid UI creation.

title: Bio Data Form
description: A professional and user-friendly Bio Data Form web application developed using HTML and CSS. This project features a clean, modern interface designed for efficient data entry and validation. The form is fully responsive, ensuring seamless usability across devices. Successfully deployed on GitHub, it demonstrates my ability to create practical front-end solutions and deliver polished, production-ready web applications.

title: Book Finder
description: A Book Finder application developed using React.js and the Open Library API. This project allows users to search for books, view detailed information, and explore a vast collection of books from the Open Library database. The application features a responsive design, real-time search functionality, and an intuitive user interface. Fully deployed on GitHub, it showcases my skills in API integration, React development, and building interactive front-end applications.

title: Notepad Application
description: A functional Notepad application developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project provides a simple yet effective text editing interface with features like save, load, and basic formatting options. The application demonstrates my ability to create practical utility tools with clean UI design and local storage functionality. Deployed on GitHub, it showcases front-end development skills and user interface design.

title: React Todo App
description: A modern Todo application built with React.js, featuring task management capabilities with add, edit, delete, and completion tracking. This project demonstrates React state management, component architecture, and responsive design. The app includes local storage for data persistence and a clean, intuitive user interface. Fully deployed on GitHub, it highlights my proficiency in React development and modern JavaScript practices.

title: Snake Game
description: A classic Snake game implementation using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project features smooth gameplay mechanics, score tracking, and increasing difficulty levels. The game demonstrates my skills in game development logic, canvas manipulation, and interactive front-end programming. Deployed on GitHub, it showcases creative problem-solving and attention to user experience in web-based games.
